attributes.action: Leaflets detailing L.C.P. to be availble on ALL wards/Spaces for Visitors/Patients to read Implications of.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Government to have Leaflets with FULL details of the Liverpool Care Pathway made available to visitors/Patients have access to, so, as to be able to familiarise themselves BEFORHAND with what is being OFFERED?
